nudist.desc: { NAME } enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. They can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

bloodlust.desc: { NAME } gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death.

kind.desc: { NAME } is a nice person. They have a tendency to brighten everyone else's day and never insult others.

psychopath.desc: { NAME } has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother them at all.

cannibal.desc: { NAME } was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, they tried it... and they liked it.

abrasive.desc: { NAME } always says exactly what's on their mind, especially if it's bugging them. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

too-smart.desc: { NAME } is too smart for their own good. They learn everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

brawler.desc: { NAME } likes to fight up close and personal.

nimble.desc: { NAME } has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. They seem to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

fast-learner.desc: { NAME } has a knack for learning. They pick things up much faster than others.

slow-learner.desc: { NAME } is slow on the uptake. They pick things up much slower than others.

masochist.name: Masochist
masochist.desc: For { NAME }, there's something exciting about getting hurt. They don't know why, they're just wired differently.

transhumanist.desc: { NAME } feels limited in their feeble human body.

body-purest.desc: { NAME } believes the human body is limited for a reason.

night-owl.desc: { NAME } likes to work at night.

greedy.desc: { NAME } has an excessive desire for wealth and/or power.

jealous.desc: { NAME } shows an envious resentment towards others more successful or advantaged.

ascetic.desc: { NAME } has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle.

asexual.desc: { NAME } has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

gay.desc: { NAME } is romantically attracted to people of their own gender.

bisexual.desc: { NAME } is romantically attracted to both men and women.

misandrist.desc: { NAME } really dislikes and distrusts men.

misogynist.desc: { NAME } really dislikes and distrusts women.

great-memory.desc: { NAME } has a fantastic memory for detail.

tough.desc: { NAME } has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones.

quick-sleeper.desc: { NAME } doesn't need as much sleep as the average person.

annoying-voice.desc: { NAME }'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike them.

creepy-breathing.desc: { NAME } breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

undergrounder.desc: { NAME } has no need to experience the outdoors or light.

tortured-artist.desc: { NAME } feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings.

chemical-fascination.desc: { NAME } is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges.

chemical-interest.desc: { NAME } has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges.

teetotaler.desc: { NAME } abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. { PRONOUN } strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.

industrious.desc: { NAME } has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

hard-worker.desc: { NAME } is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

lazy.desc: { NAME } is a little bit lazy.

slothful.desc: { NAME } loves idleness and hates anything productive.

jogger.desc: { NAME } always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

fast-walker.desc: { NAME } likes to be where { PRONOUN }'s going. { PRONOUN } walks quicker than most people.

slowpoke.desc: { NAME } is always falling behind the group whenever { PRONOUN } goes anywhere.
